title: nIla mAmayil adan
sahitya:
nIla mAmayil adan mEl iru mAdarODu kOlak-kATsi tarum vElanaip-paNI manamE


anupallavi

  kAlamellAm vINil kazhikkAmal inimEl nAlu vEdangaLin mUlapporuL Odina


caraNam    nilaiyAga nillAmal alai pOlavE tAvi alaiyum un iyalbinai aDakkiyE oDukkavum
malaiAga uruvAgi kulai naDukka muTTum tolaiyAda tol vinait-tollai tanait-taDukkavum
